sense.gloss: suspension of water supply, water outage

sdata.e: The water has been cut off.

sdata.j: ↑水道↑↓すいどう↓が|↑断水|↑↓だんすい↓しました。
sdata.e: The water has been cut off.

sdata.j: ↑明日↑↓あした↓の↑午後↑↓ごご↓１↑時↑↓じ↓から３↑時↑↓じ↓まで、↑工事↑↓こうじ↓のため|↑断水|↑↓だんすい↓だって。↑覚↑↓おぼ↓えておいてね。
sdata.e: The water will be cut off tomorrow from 1 p.m. to 3 p.m. due to construction work. Don't forget.
